channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DB2 for Linux and UNIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DB2 for Linux and UNIX

item.title: CVE-2020-4885|2024-08-04T08:14:58.548Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%20and%20unix
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow a local user to access and change the configuration of Db2 due to a race condition of a symbolic link,. IBM X-Force ID: 190909.

item.title: CVE-2020-4945|2024-08-04T08:14:59.129Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%20and%20unix
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to overwrite arbirary files due to improper group permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 191945.
